body:
I think it should be.

Community´s opinion?

[https://energyplus.net/interfaces](https://energyplus.net/interfaces)
topic: Should be Honeybee an E+ third-party graphical user interface

replies.body: Good point! It should be. I emailed them last December and they told me that [energyplus.net/interfaces](http://energyplus.net/interfaces) static content will be replaced by [buildingenergysoftwaretools.com](http://buildingenergysoftwaretools.com/) soon so there is no point in adding Honeybee to the page.
Wow, the library is great. Didn't realize there's so many BEM tools.
